eLTER get_activity_info function

Source: R/get_activity_info.R
get_activity_info.Rd

This function obtains the info of activity (actually title) provided in DEIMS-SDR.

get_activity_info(activityid)

Arguments

activityid

A character. The DEIMS activity ID from DEIMS-SDR website. More information about DEIMS iD in this page.

Value

The output of the function is a `tibble` with main features of the activities in a site, and a `leaflet` map plot.

Author

Alessandro Oggioni, phD (2020) oggioni.a@irea.cnr.it

Examples

activities <- get_activity_info(
  activityid =
  "https://deims.org/activity/8786fc6d-5d70-495c-b901-42f480182845"
)
#> 
 Found 1 records...
 Imported 1 records. Simplifying...
